[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/871904 Ubuntu Launchpad 'not working' report] 
[ 625.093338] phy2 -> rt2x00_set_chip: Info - Chipset detected - rt: 3070, rf: 0005, rev: 0201.
